fields.label: Display table of contents
fields.description: When enabled the table of contents is showed when opening the book

fields.label: Display Progress Indicators
fields.description: When enabled there will be indicators per page showing the user if he is done with the page or not.

fields.label: Enable automatic progress type
fields.description: If enabled a page without tasks is considered done when viewed. A page with tasks when all tasks are done. If unchecked there will be a button at the bottom of every page for the user to click when done with the page.
